Description: Fragment of papyrus with red and black vignette from the Amduat; the preserved portion shows the ram-headed sun-god and one of the deities towing the solar bark. Mounted in one frame with 75027-30.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: William John Bankes
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381148) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381148)
Taylor et al 2011 / The history and conservation of the papyrus of Tuy (p.98)
